text: Lucy Walter (c. 1630 â€“ 1658), also known as Lucy Barlow, was the first mistress of Charles II. She is the mother of James Scott, 1st Duke of Monmouth. == Life == === Ancestry and early life === Lucy Walter was born into Welsh gentry as the daughter of William Walter and his wife Elizabeth Prothero. She was born somewhere around 1930 at her family's home in Roch Castle near Haverfordwest in Pembrokeshire, Wales. She had two brothers, Richard and Justus. She did not receive any formal education but learned etiquette. Category:1630 births Category:1658 deaths Category:House of Stuart Category:17th century in England
title: Lucy Walter
